Unleashed Beast.name: Unleashed Beast
Unleashed Beast.flavor: An ancestor spirits awaken violence in your allies.
keywords:
Ranged 10

Target: One ally

Effect: The ally makes a basic attack. If this attack hits, the ally gains resist 10 all until the end of your next turn.
Unleashed Beast.effect: The ally makes a basic attack. If this attack hits, the ally gains resist 10 all until the end of your next turn.

Ancestral Congress.name: Ancestral Congress
Ancestral Congress.flavor: Ghostly forms mutter and wail as they swirl about you.
Ancestral Congress.effect: You and all adjacent allies gain concealment. If an enemy ends its turn adjacent to you, you can slide that foe 1 square.

Ancestral Possession.name: Ancestral Possession
Ancestral Possession.flavor: A ghostly form streaks from you to plunge into your foeâ€™s body.
Ancestral Possession.attack: Wisdom + 6 vs. Will or Charisma + 6 vs. Will
Ancestral Possession.onHit: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier or Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target is dominated (save ends).
